page.title: 09CORNISH PLACE NAMES
page.content:
{ "BY TRE, POL AND PEN { YE SHALL KNOW CORNISHMEN"
Tre, Pol and Pen are common Cornish words found in the names of people and places. many of the place-names of our survey are derived from Cornish words. The translation of the names give us clues to the characteristics of the place: ALSEVEOR.......home in a grove BOJEA..........cow house CAERLOGGAS.....camp of mice CARBEAN........little camp CARN GREY......grey stones CARCLAZE.......green camp CHY TAN........fire house HALLASE........little moor PENHALE........end of the moor PENWITHICK.....hill with trees TY GWYN........white house
